content: With your first optional miniboss defeated, it's time to work on clearing out the rest of the Foothills. From the area where you fought Jiao-Loong of Waves, ascend and look to the left. You should be able to see another body of water here, on a higher part of the cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Jiao-Loong of Waves'.
The content is as follows:
With your first optional miniboss defeated, it's time to work on clearing out the rest of the Foothills. From the area where you fought Jiao-Loong of Waves, ascend and look to the left. You should be able to see another body of water here, on a higher part of the cliff.
